testCases.name: Functional Application Test
testCases.description: Verify the application has actual functionality beyond basic placeholder
steps: Navigate to application homepage
Verify multiple interactive elements exist (navigation menu, buttons, image gallery)
Check for proper navigation structure with working links
Verify application shows real image showcase features, not just placeholder content
Confirm responsive design elements are present
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application shows functional image showcase features with interactive navigation and gallery display
testCases.failureCondition: If page only shows basic placeholder content without image gallery functionality, this test should FAIL

testCases.name: Homepage Image Gallery Test
testCases.description: Test that the homepage displays image showcases properly
steps: Load the homepage
Verify 'Explore Showcases' heading is visible
Check for image grid layout with showcase cards
Verify each showcase card has image, title, and description
Test 'View Image' links are clickable and functional
testCases.expectedOutcome: Homepage displays a grid of image showcases with proper layout and interactive elements

testCases.name: Navigation Menu Test
testCases.description: Test that navigation menu is properly implemented and functional
steps: Check for logo/brand link in top navigation
Verify 'Explore' link is present and clickable
Verify 'Featured' link is present and clickable
Check for authentication links (Log In/Sign Up) when not authenticated
Test responsive navigation behavior
testCases.expectedOutcome: Navigation menu contains all expected links and is fully functional

testCases.name: Authentication Interface Test
testCases.description: Test authentication forms and UI elements
steps: Navigate to login page via 'Log In' link
Verify login form has email and password fields
Check for 'Sign Up' option/link
Navigate to registration page
Verify registration form has email, username, and password fields
Test form validation and error handling
testCases.expectedOutcome: Authentication forms are properly implemented with all required fields and validation

testCases.name: Image Search Functionality Test
testCases.description: Test image search and filtering capabilities
steps: Navigate to explore page
Look for search functionality or filters
Test searching for images by category or keyword
Verify search results display properly
Check pagination or load more functionality
testCases.expectedOutcome: Search functionality works and returns relevant image results

testCases.name: Responsive Design Test
testCases.description: Test application responsiveness across different screen sizes
steps: Test application on desktop viewport (1200px+)
Test on tablet viewport (768px-1199px)
Test on mobile viewport (320px-767px)
Verify navigation adapts to smaller screens
Check image gallery layout adjusts properly
Ensure all interactive elements remain accessible
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application displays properly and remains functional across all screen sizes

testCases.name: Image Detail View Test
testCases.description: Test individual image detail pages and interactions
steps: Click on an image from the gallery
Verify image detail page loads with full-size image
Check for image title, description, and metadata
Look for social interaction buttons (like, comment)
Test navigation back to gallery
testCases.expectedOutcome: Image detail pages display complete information and interaction options

testCases.name: User Profile Test
testCases.description: Test user profile pages and information display
steps: Navigate to a user profile page
Verify user information is displayed (username, bio, etc.)
Check for user's uploaded images gallery
Test profile navigation and links
Verify social features (follow button, etc.)
testCases.expectedOutcome: User profiles display complete information and user's image collections

testCases.name: Loading States Test
testCases.description: Test loading indicators and states throughout the application
steps: Navigate through different pages and observe loading states
Verify loading spinners appear during data fetching
Check that loading states don't persist indefinitely
Test error states when data fails to load
Verify smooth transitions between loading and loaded states
testCases.expectedOutcome: Loading states are properly implemented and provide good user experience

testCases.name: Content Quality Test
testCases.description: Verify application has meaningful content and professional appearance
steps: Check page has substantial content beyond placeholder text
Verify proper heading structure and typography
Look for actual application features and functionality
Ensure professional appearance and design consistency
Verify images and media load properly
Check for proper error handling and user feedback
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application demonstrates real functionality with professional design and meaningful content

testCases.name: API Integration Test
testCases.description: Test that frontend properly integrates with backend API
steps: Monitor network requests in browser dev tools
Verify API calls are made to correct endpoints
Check that data is properly fetched and displayed
Test error handling for failed API requests
Verify authentication tokens are properly sent
testCases.expectedOutcome: Frontend successfully communicates with backend API and handles responses properly

testCases.name: Social Features Test
testCases.description: Test social interaction features like likes, comments, and follows
steps: Look for like buttons on images
Test comment functionality on image details
Check for follow/unfollow buttons on user profiles
Verify social interaction counters update properly
Test notification system for social interactions
testCases.expectedOutcome: Social features are implemented and functional for user interactions
